input_text.Prompt:
Conversation:
Marcos: I don't know how to adjust my life. Would you give me a piece of advice?
Ben: You look a bit pale, don't you?
Marcos: Yes, I can't sleep well every night.
Ben: You should get plenty of sleep.
Marcos: I drink a lot of wine.
Ben: If I were you, I wouldn't drink too much.
Marcos: I often feel so tired.
Ben: You better do some exercise every morning.
Marcos: I sometimes find the shadow of death in front of me.
Ben: Why do you worry about your future? You're very young, and you'll make great contribution to the world. I hope you take my advice.

Now write a summary of the conversation:
input_text.Response A: Marcos is not sleeping well and is feeling very tired. He drinks wine every night to relax. Ben thinks he should do some exercise in the morning.
input_text.Response B: In the conversation, Marcos expressed a feeling of uncertainty about adjusting his life. Ben gave him advice on how to have a healthier lifestyle and suggested that he should not worry about the future. Marcos shared his feelings about death and Ben encouraged him to believe in himself and his abilities to make a positive impact in the world.

label_annotations.feedback: I think "B" is much better because it is a lot more human in the wording.
